Module ca.utoronto.utm.assignment2
Package ca.utoronto.utm.assignment2.paint

Class DrawModeStrategy

java.lang.Object
ca.utoronto.utm.assignment2.paint.DrawModeStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:
ModeStrategy
Direct Known Subclasses:
PolylineModeStrategy, TextModeStrategy
public class DrawModeStrategy extends Object implements ModeStrategy
A strategy class for handling drawing behavior in a painting application.

This class implements the ModeStrategy interface and provides logic for handling mouse events (movement, clicks, dragging) during the drawing mode. It manages the creation and finalization of shapes based on user interactions, such as left-clicking to start drawing, dragging to update the shape, and releasing the mouse to finalize the shape.

See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • DrawModeStrategy

      public DrawModeStrategy(PaintModel model, String mode, PropertiesPanel pp)
      Constructs a new DrawModeStrategy with the specified paint model, mode, and properties panel.
      Parameters:
      model - The paint model to manage the shapes being drawn.
      mode - The current drawing mode (e.g., line, rectangle, etc.).
      pp - The properties panel containing the current paint properties (e.g., color, stroke width).

  • Method Details

    • onMouseMoved

      public void onMouseMoved(Point point)
      Handles mouse movement events. This implementation does nothing (no-op).
      Specified by:
      onMouseMoved in interface ModeStrategy
      Parameters:
      point - The point where the mouse moved.

    • onMousePressed

      public void onMousePressed(Point point, boolean isPrimaryButton, boolean isSecondaryButton)
      Handles mouse press events to begin drawing a shape.

      This method handles only the left mouse button (primary button). If a shape is being drawn and the mouse is pressed with another button, it is ignored. The shape is finalized if another shape is currently being drawn when the user presses the mouse.

      Specified by:
      onMousePressed in interface ModeStrategy
      Parameters:
      point - The point where the mouse was pressed.
      isPrimaryButton - Whether the left mouse button (primary button) was pressed.
      isSecondaryButton - Whether the right mouse button (secondary button) was pressed.

    • onMouseDragged

      public void onMouseDragged(Point point)
      Handles mouse drag events to update the current shape's endpoint as the mouse is dragged. The shape is updated with each new point and added to the temporary shapes in the model.
      Specified by:
      onMouseDragged in interface ModeStrategy
      Parameters:
      point - The point where the mouse is being dragged.

    • onMouseReleased

      public void onMouseReleased(Point point)
      Handles mouse release events to finalize the current shape.

      This method finalizes the current shape when the mouse button is released. The shape is then added to the model and the drawing state is reset.

      Specified by:
      onMouseReleased in interface ModeStrategy
      Parameters:
      point - The point where the mouse was released.

    • finalizeShape

      public void finalizeShape()
      Finalizes the drawing process for the current shape.

      This method updates the model with the shape to be created and clears the selected shape. It is called when the shape is ready to be finalized, either on mouse release or when another shape is being created.
